title: Bikepackers, Meet Your Next Big Ride: The Great Plains Gravel Route
content:
The route links six standalone segments through Texas, Oklahoma, Kansas, Nebraska, South Dakota, and North Dakota, and is set to be fully mapped by early 2025.

Read the full article at Bikepackers, Meet Your Next Big Ride: The Great Plains Gravel Route on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
